mapper.select: SELECT A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_SJ, A.QUSTNR_PURPS, A.QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QUSTNR_BGNDE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QUSTNR_ENDDE, A.QUSTNR_TRGET, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID) QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO WHERE 1=1
AND QUSTNR_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}), '%') )
mapper.update: UPDATE LETTNQESTNRINFO SET QUSTNR_SJ=#{qestnrSj}, QUSTNR_PURPS=#{qestnrPurps}, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID=#{qestnrTmplatId}, QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN=#{qestnrWritngGuidanceCn}, QUSTNR_BGNDE=REPLACE(#{qestnrBeginDe},'-',''), QUSTNR_TRGET=#{qestnrTrget}, QUSTNR_ENDDE=REPLACE(#{qestnrEndDe},'-',''), LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_SJ QESTNR_SJ, A.QUSTNR_PURPS QESTNR_PURPS, A.QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN AS "qestnrWritngGuidanceCn", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QESTNR_BEGIN_DE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QESTNR_END_DE, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.QUSTNR_TRGET QESTNR_TRGET, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID) QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNQESTNRINFO ( QESTNR_ID, QUSTNR_SJ, QUSTNR_PURPS, QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN, QUSTNR_BGNDE, QUSTNR_ENDDE, QUSTNR_TRGET, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{qestnrId}, #{qestnrSj}, #{qestnrPurps}, #{qestnrWritngGuidanceCn}, REPLACE(#{qestnrBeginDe},'-',''), REPLACE(#{qestnrEndDe},'-',''), #{qestnrTrget}, #{qestnrTmplatId}, sysdate, #{frstRegisterId}, sysdate, #{lastUpdusrId} )
